trans-unit.source: Aegis Angel
trans-unit.target: 庇护天使

trans-unit.resname: W16·1 | Aegis Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control CARDNAME. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，于你操控CARDNAME的时段内，另一个目标永久物获得不灭异能。（注明「消灭」的效应不会消灭它。伤害无法消灭具不灭异能的生物。）

trans-unit.resname: W16·2 | Marked by Honor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Marked by Honor
trans-unit.target: 荣誉标记

trans-unit.resname: W16·2 | Marked by Honor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有警戒异能。（它攻击时不需横置。）

trans-unit.resname: W16·2 | Marked by Honor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Stand your post for duty. Stand your ground for honor.
trans-unit.target: 因职责而守卫。为荣誉而守护。

trans-unit.source: Serra Angel
trans-unit.target: 撒拉天使

trans-unit.resname: W16·3 | Serra Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nVigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） 警戒（此生物攻击时不需横置。）

trans-unit.source: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.
trans-unit.target: 跟随明光。若置身黑暗，就跟随她。

trans-unit.source: Air Servant
trans-unit.target: 大气仆役

trans-unit.resname: W16·4 | Air Servant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\n{2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） {2}{U}：横置目标具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.source: Wind is forceful, yet ephemeral. It can knock a dragon out of the sky, yet pass through the smallest crack unhindered.
trans-unit.target: 风强劲却无形。它能击落天空的龙，又能轻易钻过最小的裂缝。

trans-unit.source: Disperse
trans-unit.target: 驱散

trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: It's pointless to hold on when you have nothing to hold on with.
trans-unit.target: 当你没有坚持下去的目标时，坚持是没有意义的。

trans-unit.resname: W16·6 | Sphinx of Magosi | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sphinx of Magosi
trans-unit.target: 马格西史芬斯

trans-unit.resname: W16·6 | Sphinx of Magosi | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\n{2}{U}: Draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 （此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） {2}{U}：抓一张牌，然后在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: W16·6 | Sphinx of Magosi | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A riddle is nothing more than a trap for small minds, baited with the promise of understanding."
trans-unit.target: 「谜语只不过是对付卑微心灵的陷阱，以终能理解的承诺为诱饵。」

trans-unit.source: Mind Rot
trans-unit.target: 心之衰

trans-unit.resname: W16·7 | Mind Rot | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player discards two cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手弃两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "It saddens me to lose a source of inspiration. This one seemed especially promising."\n—Ashiok
trans-unit.target: 「失去灵感的源泉，令我非常难过。尤其是这一个看上去大有可为。」 ～安梭苛

trans-unit.source: Nightmare
trans-unit.target: 梦魇

trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nCARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的沼泽数量。

trans-unit.source: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.
trans-unit.target: 它的铁蹄巨响将梦击入绝境。

trans-unit.source: Sengir Vampire
trans-unit.target: 辛格氏吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: W16·9 | Sengir Vampire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nWhenever a creature dealt damage by CARDNAME this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） 每当一个本回合中曾受到CARDNAME伤害的生物死去时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.
trans-unit.target: 帝国兴落，邪恶永存。

trans-unit.source: Walking Corpse
trans-unit.target: 行尸

trans-unit.source: "Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared."\n—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia
trans-unit.target: 「正常的军队要考虑食粮补给的问题。而这正是灵俑部队的优点。他们因进食而战。也因进食而被人惧怕。」 ～涅非利亚尸鬼牧者贾达

trans-unit.source: Borderland Marauder
trans-unit.target: 边境劫掠者

trans-unit.resname: W16·11 | Borderland Marauder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，它得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.
trans-unit.target: 虽然她确实令人畏惧，但其战斗事迹却鲜有流传，因为没人能活过她的突袭。

trans-unit.resname: W16·12 | Cone of Flame | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cone of Flame
trans-unit.target: 火炎锥

trans-unit.resname: W16·12 | Cone of Flame | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害，对另一个目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害，对第三个目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Shivan Dragon
trans-unit.target: 西瓦巨龙

trans-unit.resname: W16·13 | Shivan Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\n{R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。） {R}：CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.
trans-unit.target: 西瓦山脉无庸置疑的主人。

trans-unit.source: Incremental Growth
trans-unit.target: 增值成长

trans-unit.resname: W16·14 | Incremental Growth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, two +1/+1 counters on another target creature, and three +1/+1 counters on a third target creature.
trans-unit.target: 在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，在另一个目标生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物，在第三个目标生物上放置三个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Tie a mouse under a bridge, and your cabbages will triple in size."\n—Kithkin superstition
trans-unit.target: 「在桥下吊只老鼠，你的甘蓝菜就会长到三倍大。」 ～洁英的迷信

trans-unit.source: Oakenform
trans-unit.target: 橡树形体

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +3/+3.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+3/+3。

trans-unit.source: "When the beast cloaks itself in the mighty oak, what good is a bow? When the oak wraps itself around the snarling beast, what good is a hatchet?"\n—Dionus, elvish archdruid
trans-unit.target: 「如果野兽藏身在雄伟橡树中，弓岂能奈他何？如果橡树有咆哮的野兽护身，斧头岂能奈他何？」 ～妖精高位德鲁伊戴欧诺

trans-unit.resname: W16·16 | Soul of the Harvest | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soul of the Harvest
trans-unit.target: 收成灵

trans-unit.resname: W16·16 | Soul of the Harvest | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)\nWhenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 践踏（此生物攻击时造成之过量战斗伤害能对防御牌手或鹏洛客造成之。） 每当另一个非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，你可以抓一张牌。
